name: Avoid large Classes - too many Data Members
description: This rule searches for C++ classes that contain too many data members. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
Associated to each C++ Class with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The number of Data Members
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, Interfaces should not have too many Data Members..
remediation: Review the Class design to reduce the number of data members.
